Compare news coverage. Spot media bias. Avoid algorithms. Try Ground News today and get 40% off your subscription by going to: https://ground.news/climatetown

This episode is a collaboration with one of the best climate investigative journalists working today, Amy Westervelt. Amy has a podcast and ongoing reporting project called DRILLED that you should ABSOLUTELY check out, here’s the link: https://drilled.media/ 

Want to support us and also get access to behind the scenes videos, discounted live show tickets, and a secret phone line you can call and talk to Rollie? Well then you’ll be shocked to find that’s exactly what our Patreon offers: https://www.patreon.com/ClimateTown

title: Dairy Is Milking America Dry | Climate Town
